main.name: Rahul Aryan
main.occupation: Full Stack Developer at Tekonika Technologies and Full-Stack(MERN) Developer
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe Code
main.bio: From 'Hello World' to 'Hello, My Name is Rahul Aryan, and am from IIIT-BH. I've Been Working for 3+ Years'! Turning caffeine into code and bugs into distant memories, one 'Eureka!' moment at a time.I specialize in creating robust and user-friendly applications. I am passionate about leveraging innovative solutions to drive impactful results in the ever-evolving tech landscape. Always ready to turn '404 not found' into '200 OK',Love to solve the problems and eager to take the challenging tasks.

education.description: Exploring the Computer Science subjects like Programming Language, Data structures and algorithms and Artificial intelligence and machine learning

work.title: Full-Stack Developer

Workedcloselywiththedevelopmentteamtotroubleshootissues,optimize API calls, and improve the overall performance.

work.title: Front-End Developer
work.description: Successfully developed and delivered the full front-end application for Loyalty Caravan, ensuring a seamless and user-friendly interface. Collaboratedcloselywiththebackenddevelopmentteam,activelyparticipating in the creation of RESTful APIs to establish smooth communication between the front-end and back-end systems.

work.title: Full-Stack Developer

testimonials.text: Rahul is absolutely excellent, his depth of knowledge & his mentorship really meant a lot to us... I would definitely recommend
Work with Rahul has been AWESOME, he makes so easy and approachable, you'll finally feel like you know what's going on!
